channel.title: aws sam on GPK
channel.description: Recent content in aws sam on GPK

item.title: Corporate Website
item.description: Used mainly static content and ported new copy/layout to SAM Serverless Application C# .NET Core Razor Pages solution. Originally WP was in place, so removing MySQL reduced the cost. I created a CI/CD Pipeline using BitBucket. It is now hosted via API Gateway & Lambda and not via an Azure Website.
